fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Send wolves after a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If they ever visit a Twilight Werewolf player in the future, they will be dealt an Astral Powerful Attack. They will be informed that they are being hunted by wolves
Werewolf Fixation: Anybody killed by you gets their will erased.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take out all who disturb this terrible romance
